value.name: Letter: More work to be done
value.description: According to The Washington Post, nearly 250 women have been fatally shot by police since 2015. Some of these women include Natasha McKenna, Alexia Christian, Gabriela Nevarez, Yvette Smith ...

value.name: Why is no one talking about black women abused by police?
value.description: Miriam Carey, Kayla Moore, Shelly Frey, Michelle Cusseux, Mya Hall, and Alexia Christian all died in police custody during the same timeframes as black men whose deaths dominated national news.
